home.message: OpenSource Software and Hardware with Passion
home.introduction: Hi! My name is up there and I'm a Software Developer from Germany. Here you can find a summary of my private projects.

esp32.title: ESP32 Intercom Extension
esp32.description: A ESP32 based PCB designed to control a Siedle HT611-01 intercom system. It allows features like remote door opening, doorbell notification, and muting. The project includes assembly instructions, firmware flashing guide, and installation details.

photok.title: Photok: A safe place for your photos
photok.description: Photok is a completly free photo safe. It stores your photos encrypted on your device and secures them with a password.

kolibri.title: Kolibri Messenger
kolibri.description: Kolibri is a free and completely private Android Messenger. Completely private means it needs a Server to connect to. The App connects to the server and uses no other services. It is also completly encrypted and has does not save your data to the cloud.

kolibri-server.title: Kolibri Server
kolibri-server.description: Kolibri Server is the backend for the Kolibri Messenger App. It's docker based and also completely free.

godaddy-dyndns.title: GoDaddy DynDNS
godaddy-dyndns.description: Python based GoDaddy DynDNS script using only the GoDaddy API.

scrypt.title: SCrypt
scrypt.description: SCrypt is a JavaFX Desktop Application to encrypt end decrypt files with AES-256.

scrypt-lite.title: SCrypt lite
scrypt-lite.description: SCrypt lite is the terminal equivalent to SCrypt. It encrypt end decryptes files with AES-256.

liability.line2: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with Section 7 (1) of the German Telemedia Act. liability.line3: Obligations to remove or block the use of information according to general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the time we become aware of a specific legal violation. As soon as we become aware of such violations, we will remove this content immediately.
liability.line5: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, the content of which we have no influence on. For this reason, we cannot accept any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time the link was created. No illegal content was discernible at the time the link was created.
liability.line6: A permanent control of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of an infringement. As soon as we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.

copyright.line2: The content and works on these pages created by the site operator are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, editing, distribution and any kind of use outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this page are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.
copyright.line3: As far as the content on this page was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular contents of third parties are marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please let us know. As soon as we become aware of legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.
